title: Why client is taking so long to load?
body: Yesterday my client was still fine but today after logging in. My client kept stuck at loading mode after more than 5 min waiting. Then i tried to exit and log in again. This time, my screen only showing League of Legends logo and the client didn't even pop up. Anyone experience this problem?

replies.body: That is definitely a long time to get things loaded! ><  Are you on a Mac or a PC?  Most symptoms here are showing signs of a network problem struggling to load your assets, so our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help with that.  Getting the client to launch at all may depend on your OS, so let me know unless the guide helped!
I'm good already. After almost 1 hour failing to connect to the client and loading its interface. I decided to reinstall the client and it solved the problem. Thanks =)
